PURPOSE: To create a new account for the user by collecting Personal and Account details and storing them
Lets the user to either view all the existing accounts or view the details of a specific one using User ID
Lets the user update their personal details based on their User ID.
To delete an existing account or a set of accounts under a user based on Account number or User ID
Lets the user book an appointment by entering their Account number and choosing a date.
Discusses further features we'd like to add to this app in the future
Exits the menu and closes the app.
